name: Broken Link
description:
Broken Link

Evade obstacles by moving the two objects together. Collect power-ups that help you reach your new high-score! You can even challenge your friends in the 1 versus 1 mode, to see who's got the best concentration and coordination! 

Controls

A/D - Move LEFT/RIGHT

W/S - Move APART/TOGETHER

ESCAPE - Bring up menu
